author: mxs_
content: <@550420431744794624> <@415109946682769408>  I'm considering working on/sending a PR for: https://github.com/ethereum/staking-deposit-cli/issues/140 as I have a use-case for it; is it something you think could make it? Asking first as the issue is quite old and you may have other plans there

author: hsiaowei
content:
Hi <@566569593586450445>, I'm open to it. I think it only needs to implement the optional `--pbkdf2` flag.

<@550420431744794624> may have more inputs since he implemented the `Pbkdf2Keystore`. ðŸ™‚
